welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chiayi, Taiwan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chiayi has to offer.

restaurants.name: 林聰明沙鍋魚頭
restaurants.description: 林聰明沙鍋魚頭 is a asian restaurant located in 嘉義市.
restaurants.address: 中正路361號, 嘉義市, Chiayi 600

restaurants.name: 福義軒 Foyishan
restaurants.description: 福義軒 Foyishan is a snack place located in 嘉義市.
restaurants.address: 成功街98號, 嘉義市, Chiayi 600

restaurants.name: 呆獅雞肉飯
restaurants.description: 呆獅雞肉飯 is a chinese restaurant located in 嘉義市.
restaurants.address: 民族路665號, 嘉義市, Chiayi

restaurants.name: Hand on the Pizza (手在比薩)
restaurants.description: Hand on the Pizza (手在比薩) is a pizzeria located in 嘉義市.
restaurants.address: 忠義街129-1號, 嘉義市, Chiayi 600

restaurants.name: 大同火雞肉飯
restaurants.description: 大同火雞肉飯 is a taiwanese restaurant located in 東區.
restaurants.address: 民族路113號 (安和街), 東區, Chiayi 600

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
